title: My Close Friend
description: The story begins with a shimmering night scene as the New Year is coming, the young couple have a great time together, they sit on the roof and watch the fireworks are fired into the sky. This is a story between childhood friends, we return to reality after 10 years, now the boy has grown up and has secret desires. And he met her old friend, she was still so beautiful, but when she looked at her. Ken can understand her desire … And a love story begins with a lot of wonderful hot scenes.
